fields.constraint_descr: Lists the valid range of quantity of a product that can go in a box.
Limit of the number of years in the future that an expiration year is valid.  This limit is applied to the current year. i. e. the current year + this value is considerd valid.

Any location in the warehouse that is excluded from holding inventory.  Each entry is a location code of the form 'rrbbtt' where:

'rr' = row 
'bb' = bin  
'tt' = tier
